channel.title: Autoclicker for mopar
channel.description: May someone make me an autoclicker that keeps clicking intill im on the server.

item.title: Autoclicker for mopar
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Sigh…

One order of auto clicker, coming up.

Color / Item clicker:

[code]program SimpleAutoClicker;

var
x, y: Integer;
const
itemcolor= 253624743; //Place color here.
speed= 100; //Speed in Miliseconds between clicks

Procedure ClickColor;
begin
FindColor(x, y, itemcolor,0,0,549,399);
wait(0);
MoveMouse(x, y);
Clickmouse(x, y, true);
end;

Begin
Cleardebug;
repeat
ClickColor;
Wait(speed);
until(false);
End.[/code]

Clicks wherever your mouse is. F5 to stop.

[code]program SimpleAutoClicker;

var
x, y: Integer;
const
speed= 3; //Wait time in seconds between clicks

Procedure ClickIt;
begin
GetMousePos(x,y);
MoveMouse(x,y);
wait(5)
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
end;

Begin
Cleardebug;
repeat
ClickIt;
Wait(speed);
until(isFkeyDown(5));
End.[/code]

Read full topic
